project_plan.name: Word Frequency Counter in Python
project_plan.description: Develop a Python program that reads a text file, counts the frequency of each word, and displays the top 10 most common words in the terminal.

task.name: Implement the functionality to read a text file and count word frequency
Retrieve and display the top 10 most common words
Write tests for the word counting and top 10 features
Execute tests to ensure word counting and top words display work correctly
